title: Leviathan
description: When his closest friend, Benjamin Sachs, accidentally blows himself up on a Wisconsin road, Peter Aaron attempts to piece together the life that led to Sach's tragic demise and determine the reason for his death.This production is part of our Audible Modern Vanguard line, a collection of important works from groundbreaking authors.Â©1993 Paul Auster; (P)2009 Audible, Inc.
author: Paul Auster
